metadata.title: Ayaz lauds security forces for successful operation against Fitna-e-Khawarij

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 04 (APP):Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq Friday lauded security forces for a successful operation against the Indian-supported Fitna-e-Khawarij along with Pakistan-Afghanistan border. In a statement issued by the National Assembly Secretariat, Ayaz Sadiq paid glowing tribute to the forces, specifically commending them for eliminating 30 Fitna-e-Khawarij during the operation. aThe timely and effective action against terrorists is a testament to the security forcesa professional capabilities,a the Speaker said. He emphasized that aIndia-backed terrorists are being brought to justice.a Expressing national solidarity, the Speaker asserted, aThe entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with security forces against Fitna-e-Khawarij.a He highlighted the nationas pride in its security institutions, saying, aThe nation is proud of the sacrifices and bravery of its security institutions.a
